title: Any plot/layout having area excluding area under DP Road/ prescribed RL as per MMC Act may be allowed to be developed under this Regulation by insisting handing over of 35 % amenity of the required under Regulation No
clause_text: Any plot/layout having area excluding area under DP Road/ prescribed RL as per MMC Act may be allowed to be developed under this Regulation by insisting handing over of 35 % amenity of the required under Regulation No. 14(B) (c). Requirement of LOS as per the provisions of Regulation No.27 (1)(a) shall be insisted.
section: Development of reservation in Redevelopment for Rehabilitation of Slum Dwellers under Regulation No. 33(10)
